includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Raymond ‘Red’ Reddington continues his battle with Berlin and the rest of the world’s most notorious criminals that only he can stop. Electrifying U.S. smash-hit, starring James Spader.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Red continues his battle with Berlin and the world’s worst criminals. James Spader stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Raymond ‘Red’ Reddington continues his battle with Berlin and the rest of the world’s most notorious criminals that only he can stop. Electrifying U.S. smash-hit, starring James Spader.

includedIn.title: The Blacklist
includedIn.synopsis: Raymond 'Red' Reddington (James Spader), one of the world's most wanted fugitives, walks into the FBI headquarters with his hands up and a wry smile. Claiming to have unparalleled information on dangerous felons at large, Red wants to negotiate a deal to catch a presumed-dead terrorist… under one condition: he speaks only to rookie profiler Elizabeth 'Liz' Keen (Megan Boone). No-one knows why the criminal mastermind is so interested in Elizabeth, or indeed, if he's even telling the truth, but it's clear the FBI should proceed with caution…
includedIn.shortSynopsis: James Spader stars as master criminal-turned FBI informant Raymond Reddington in this thrilling drama.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Raymond 'Red' Reddington (James Spader), one of the world's most wanted fugitives, walks into the FBI headquarters with his hands up and a wry smile. Claiming to have unparalleled information on dangerous felons at large, Red wants to negotiate a deal to catch a presumed-dead terrorist… under one condition: he speaks only to rookie profiler Elizabeth 'Liz' Keen (Megan Boone). No-one knows why the criminal mastermind is so interested in Elizabeth, or indeed, if he's even telling the truth, but it's clear the FBI should proceed with caution…
